item.title: Multipens
item.description: Recently I have been trying out a few multipens when I have been studying Japanese. I wanted to be able to easily mark new vocab and other items in red and maybe do some other color coding here and there. The other criteria was that it has to be a nice thin line since I am often writing furigana as well. So I bought two well-regarded, inexpensive multipens from Yoseka Stationary:
